snippet.title: Chronos - First Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Chronos is a 2D action RPG with a player-driven economy set in a post-apocalyptic world where you will need to fight fierce enemies and build your village.

Learn more at: https://playchronos.io/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Chronos_io
Join our community: https://discord.gg/sXJHHGpQYz
